data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Feuillet, Christian (2016): Two new combinations in Euploca Nutt. (Heliotropiaceae, Boraginales) and a conspectus of the species of the Guiana Shield area. PhytoKeys 61: 101-124, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.61.6260, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.61.6260
